info.title: MailJet
info.description: A complete collection of all publicly available endpoints and methods for the Mailjet API

post.description: Send an email message via Send API v3.1

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

Email.description: The email address of the recipient
Email.title: To Email

Email.description: The email address used to send the message
Email.title: Sender Email

Name.description: User-selected name for the Sender email address
Name.title: Sender Name

TextPart.description: Provides the Text part of the message
TextPart.title: TextPart

HTMLPart.description: Provides the HTML part of the message.
HTMLPart.title: HTMLPart

TemplateID.description: Unique numeric ID of the template to be used as email content.
TemplateID.title: TemplateID

post.description: Send an email message via Send API v3

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

get.description: Get a list of messages with specific information on the type of content, tracking, sending and delivery

parameters.name: Contact
parameters.description: Retrieves only messages sent to the specified Contact ID

parameters.name: CustomID
parameters.description: Retrieves only messages tagged with the specified CustomID

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: Retrieves only messages sent to the specified Destination ID

parameters.name: FromTS
parameters.description: Retrieves only messages sent after the specified timestamp

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit the response to a select number of returned objects

parameters.name: FromType
parameters.description:
* `1` - Transactional
 * `2` - Marketing
 * `3` - Unknown

get.description: Retrieve sending/size/spam information about all messages

parameters.name: CampaignID
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages that are part of this campaign

parameters.name: ContactsList
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages that were sent to this contact list

parameters.name: CustomCampaign
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages that are part of a campaign with the specified Custom ID

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages sent from the specified sender email address

parameters.name: FromDomain
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages sent from the specified sender domain

parameters.name: FromID
parameters.description: Retrieves information only about messages sent from the specified sender ID

parameters.name: FromTS
parameters.description: Retrieves only messages sent after the specified timestamp

get.description: Retrieve a list of all contacts. Includes information about contact status and creation / activity timestamps

parameters.name: Campaign
parameters.description: Retrieves only contacts targeted by this Campaign ID

parameters.name: ContactsList
parameters.description: Retrieves only contacts that are part of this Contact List ID

parameters.name: IsExcludedFromCampaigns
parameters.description: Will retrieve only contacts that have been added to the exclusion list for marketing emails

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit the response to a select number of returned objects

post.description: Add a new unique contact to your global contact list and select its exclusion status

IsExcludedFromCampaigns.description: Indicates whether the contact is added to the exclusion list for campaigns or not
IsExcludedFromCampaigns.title: IsExcludedFromCampaigns

parameters.name: contact_ID
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the contact you want to retrieve

put.description: Update the user-given name and exclusion status of a specific contact

parameters.name: contact_ID
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the contact you want to update

IsExcludedFromCampaigns.description: Indicates whether the contact is added to the exclusion list for campaigns or not
IsExcludedFromCampaigns.title: IsExcludedFromCampaigns

Name.description: User-specified name for this contact list (must be unique)
Name.title: Name

IsDeleted.description: When true, the contact list will be marked as Deleted
IsDeleted.title: IsDeleted

parameters.name: list_ID
parameters.description: List ID

put.description: Update a specific contact list by changing its name and / or deletion status

parameters.name: list_ID
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID assigned to this contact list

Name.description: User-specified name for this contact list (must be unique)
Name.title: Name

IsDeleted.description: When true, the contact list will be marked as Deleted
IsDeleted.title: IsDeleted

get.description: Get all campaign drafts and their configuration

post.description: Create a new campaign draft. Newsletter and CampaignDraft objects are differentiated by the EditMode values.

get.description: Get a specific campaign draft and its configuration details

parameters.name: draft_ID
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the campaign draft you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: draft_ID
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the campaign draft you want to update

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

get.description: Get general details and stats for all drafts, AB Testing objects and/or sent campaigns
Retrieve a list of overall aggregated delivery and engagement statistics, grouped by contact

Filename.description: The full name of the file (including the file extension)

Content-type.description: Defines the type of content being sent out using a MIME type

Content.description: Base64 encoded content of the attached file

EditMode.description: Edit mode for the campaign draft.
EditMode.title: Edit Mode
